backend/main.mo: Defines authorization mixin, extensive US geography and proposal types, and helper constructors for empty geography, state/county structures, and proposals.
feature_evidence.json: Declares a feature-evidence report linking a Secretary widget discoverability feature to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists pre‑generated summaries of many frontend documentation and source files, mainly describing architecture, styles, geography workflows, and React components.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Explains Whisper’s architectural vision, hierarchical installations, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design for future scalability.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Provides developer-oriented deployment guidance for ICP, including dfx configuration, upgrade workflow, and cycle management practices.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines a phased development roadmap from architecture to multi‑installation support, specifying goals, deliverables, and non‑goals for each phase.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Details Whisper’s visual design system including color tokens, typography, accessibility rules, and UI styling principles conveying civic authority.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Provides the root HTML structure and loads the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout managing header actions, proposal visibility, secretary UI, and create-instance modal state.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form component for proposing new instances, handling geographic selection, auto-generated names, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog showing full proposal details with admin actions to approve or reject and built-in loading and error states.
Displays the list of proposals with loading, error, and empty states, and opens the detail dialog for selected items.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: Small banner prompting users to try the Secretary assistant with open and dismiss callbacks.
Implements a chat widget UI that integrates with useSecretaryChat to display messages, handle option selections, and manage chat state and opening behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Provides hooks to check instance name availability and submit instance creation proposals, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Implements a debounced value hook that delays updates by a specified timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, login flow, and exposing context to the app.
Provides a React state hook synchronized with localStorage with SSR safety guards.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for checking parent relationships, fetching proposals, getting a proposal, and checking admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages chat state for the Secretary assistant, including messages, menu handling, and interpreting user input into actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook that updates a proposal’s status and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React Query hooks that fetch states, counties, and places from the backend with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the app’s color system, typography, and dark mode.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Utility functions to format proposal geography into readable text and map hierarchy levels to labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors from CSS variables, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, constraints, known issues, and existing features for the Whisper platform.
